p: We selected all common SNPs within the GBA locus chr1:155204239‐155214653 (dbSNP build151, appear in at least 1% of the global population). We added 1 rare SNP (rs2230288) in the coding region of GBA (chr1:155204239‐155214653) because it had a known cis‐expression quantitative trail locus (eQTL) with GBA in the Genotype‐Tissue Expression (GTEx) project (Supplementary Fig. 1). Genomic positions of SNPs are reported for human reference hg19.
